message: Bob, I'm offering you the opportunity to purchase a unique product that I believe will be of great value to you. I've been closely following your work and I'm confident that this product would be a perfect fit for your needs. While the true value of this product is significant, I'm willing to offer it to you at a price of $1400000. This represents a substantial opportunity for you to acquire something that could be truly transformative. Please let me know your decision at your earliest convenience.
